item.title: Information about Becoming an Intro Lab TA
item.description: If you want to be notified when Spring 2023 applications will open, submit a notice of interest here! We’ll be in touch when hiring opens in mid-January 2023. You can also learn about all the other Undergraduate Course Assistant (UCA) position in the Department of Computer Science. Why would you want to be a lab TA? It’s rewarding to help people! Yaaay! It’s fun to help people with COS! Yaaay! You get lots and lots and lots of debugging experience!
